PROJECT DESCRIPTION

 Welcome to the Task Manager App application, a task manager designed to help you organize and stick to your daily commitments. 

This Android application allows users to create, modify, and track their tasks efficiently. 

**KEY FEATURES**
 • Task Addition: Quick creation of new tasks (via the FAB button).
 • Editing & Deletion: Updating and removal of existing tasks.
 • Task Filtering: Distinct viewing of completed tasks and to-do tasks.
 • Reminders: Association of a time and due date with each task.
 • Calendar Integration: Option to add a task as a reminder in the native calendar (via the "Open With" option). 

TECHNICAL INFORMATION
 • Platform: Android
 • Language: Kotlin
 • Architecture: The application follows the MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) architecture for clear separation of concerns, better testability, and simplified maintenance. • Data Management: Task data is handled via a Repository which centralizes persistence operations (future integration possible with Room Database). • Navigation & UI: Uses `RecyclerView` for list display and `Material Components` for UI elements (like the Floating Action Button). • Reminders: Potential use of WorkManager for reliable notification scheduling or `AlarmManager` for exact time-based reminders.
